audio-toggle-button.heading: Audio
audio-toggle-button.message: You won't hear any of the sound thingies on this page until you turn the audio on!

thingie-lock-toggle.heading: Unlock thingies
thingie-lock-toggle.message: When there are locked thingies on a page, this button appears so that you can unlock them.

pocket-toggle-button-closed.heading: Pocket
pocket-toggle-button-closed.message: Open your pocket to store and retrieve thingies from the current page, as well as add new thingies from your device.

pocket-toggle-button-open.heading: Pocket
pocket-toggle-button-open.message:
Hold D while clicking and holding to drag a thingie out of the pocket onto a page.

You can also take a thingie off of a page to put it in your pocket. This way, you can save it for another time or take it to another page.

settings-toggle-button.heading: Settings
settings-toggle-button.message: This is where you can toggle your settings and preferences for the site (like showing/hiding these tooltips) as well as switch from Explore to Edit mode.

explore-mode-toggle.heading: Explore mode
explore-mode-toggle.message: Enabling explore mode allows you to move through the site without worrying about changing anything.

tooltip-mode-toggle.heading: Tooltips
tooltip-mode-toggle.message: Turn off this toggle to hide tooltips.

portals-mode-toggle.heading: Portals
portals-mode-toggle.message: A portal is a passageway to another page, click on one to see where it takes you! If you don't want to see them, turn them off here.

token-input-toggle-button.heading: Add a token
token-input-toggle-button.message: Click here to submit a token. A token gives access to create within a Verse.

uploader-toggle-button.heading: Upload a file
uploader-toggle-button.message: Click to toggle the file uploader where you can add new image and sound thingies.

compost-portal-toggle-button.heading: Compost
compost-portal-toggle-button.message: If there is a thingie you want to discard from this page, throw it here in the compost, where someone else can grab it.

multiverse-link.heading: Verses
multiverse-link.message: This leads to the multiverse where you can see the verses you have access to

thingie.heading: Thingie
thingie.message: Double click on a thingie to edit it.

portal.heading: Portal
portal.message:
A portal is a passageway to another page, click on one to see where it takes you!

To make a new portal, a shift + click anywhere on the page will let you enter the name of an existing page you want to connect to this one.

canvas.heading: Page
canvas.message: You can navigate around the page by scrolling or using the arrow keys. To zoom in and out, hold shift and use the + and - keys.

caddy-handle.heading: Caddy
caddy-handle.message: Click and drag this hand to grab and move your toolkit

caddy-trash.heading: Delete thingie
caddy-trash.message: You can use this tool to remove a thingie from fuites

caddy-layer-opacity.heading: Opacity/Layer
caddy-layer-opacity.message: Send a thingie to the back layer or move it to the top. Opacity can be changed here too

caddy-rotation.heading: Rotation
caddy-rotation.message: Rotate a thingie using the radial slider

caddy-font-editor.heading: Fonts
caddy-font-editor.message: All font editing tools can be found here

caddy-color-selector.heading: Colours
caddy-color-selector.message: Use the colour picker tool to change font colours and sound thingie colours

caddy-resize.heading: Resize
caddy-resize.message: Click or hold the + and - buttons to resize. If editing a sound thingie, this tool can also serve to change the line width.

caddy-volume.heading: Volume
caddy-volume.message: Change the volume of a sound thingie

caddy-clip-toggle.heading: Clip
caddy-clip-toggle.message: Use the drawing you made when uploading an image as a clip path

caddy-lock.heading: Lock Thingie
caddy-lock.message: Lock this thingie to the background. It will no longer be moveable until you unlock it.

infoModalMarkdown:
## about fuit.es

Fuit.es aims to provide a creative online space, a platform for collective processes designed with the 'Anarchive' as its operational concept; an archive which promotes the continual evolution and variation of its documents rather than their mere preservation.

Each individual page offers a space for collaboration, where digital media in the form of images, sounds or text can be uploaded and composed with. These individual media objects are referred to as “thingies”. Anyone with a token can create a verse, a public network of pages for anarchiving thingies. If you are curious about accessing the platform, get in touch with us by email at contact@fuit.es, we would be happy to make you a token.

###### *We acknowledge the support of the Canada Council for the Arts.*
###### *Nous remercions le Conseil des arts du Canada de son soutien.*
